alert.note: Alert for Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 9:05PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Prowers and northeastern Baca Counties through 945 PM MDT... At 905 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles east of Two Buttes, or 13 miles northwest of The Saunders Elevator, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Prowers and northeastern Baca Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM MDT for southeastern Colorado.
